channel.title: Campaign Updates on UN-aligned
channel.description: Recent content in Campaign Updates on UN-aligned

item.title: Update on UN-aligned’s open letter to the United Nations Human Rights Council
item.author: Ariana Yekrangi
item.description: UN-aligned’s open letter to the UNHRC which called for a ban on countries that criminalise LGBTQ+ from forming part of the commission will be delayed owing to the latest developments in the United Nations and the ongoing war in Ukraine.
